front.title: Standard General Requirements for Dry-Type Distribution and Power Transformers Including Those with Solid Cast and/or Resin Encapsulated Windings
front.abstract: Electrical, mechanical, and safety requirements of ventilated, non-ventilated, and sealed dry-type distribuion and power transformers or auto transformers (single and polyphase, with a voltage of 601 V or higher in the highest voltage winding) are described.
